html.h1: Welcome to the Splunk App for Microsoft SharePoint 2010
html.p: This app is designed to provide comprehensive data collection and field extraction from Microsoft SharePoint 2010 and a set of starting dashboards covering health, audit and usage. The data collection includes the following:
This app will not work until all installation is completed. The installation process will take some time and some adjustment to the permissions structures that govern the SharePoint farm.

The "central Splunk instance" (consisting of search heads and indexers) can be any operating system. You must be running Splunk v5.0.3 or later on all Splunk servers within the central Splunk instance. Splunk v6.0 is not supported at this time.
Splunk App for Microsoft SharePoint 2010 supports:

ul.li: Microsoft SharePoint 2010 running on Windows Server 2008R2
SQL Server 2008R2 running on Windows Server 2008R2
SQL Server 2012 running on Windows Server 2012
